show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Healthy Skin Care
content:
Alison Rose Levy speaks with journalist Ava Anderson and Kim Sprague Anderson, the founders of Ava Anderson NonToxic... <!--more--> and why they had to form to their own personal products line to protect from toxic chemicals.
Ava and Kim are also actively communicated with Congress about whatâ€™s in our personal care products and how it affects health.
